Plot: Jesse Reilly was released from prison and he is to be married to Hope. Shortly before the wedding he is involved in a bank robbery with his friends Buzz Thomas, Teddy Pollack and Billy Phillips. It escalates to a hostage crisis, and the FBI is called. In an exchange of fire, a few men are shot. Hope and Jesse are then rescued by John G. Coleman in a helicopter.In the last scene, Jesse and Hope are shown raising their son.
Trivia: The GMC New Look which was used for the chase scene was the same bus used in the 1994 action film Speed, the number 2525 is still displayed.
